thread.title: Lost Your iPhone? Here's How to Foil Thieves and Protect Your Personal Data
thread.title_full: Lost Your iPhone? Here's How to Foil Thieves and Protect Your Personal Data

title: Lost Your iPhone? Here's How to Foil Thieves and Protect Your Personal Data
text: Before your new and shiny iPhone is lost, stolen, or snatched, change these settings to safeguard your personal data and hopefully even find your phone.
